mapper.select: SELECT EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.DEPOSIT_ISSUE_SEQ AS depositIssueSeq /* 예치금 발생 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.ISSUE_DD AS issueDd /* 발생 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.ISSUE_DEPOSIT_AMT AS issueDepositAmt /* 발생 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST /* 예치금 발생 내역 */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT /* 예치금 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.DEPOSIT_ISSUE_SEQ = #{depositIssueSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예치금 발생 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST_PK(P),SYS_C0011364(C) */ AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), FK_EZC_DEPOSIT_EZC_DEPOSIT_ISS(R),SYS_C0011365(C) */ AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22), FK_EZC_RESERV_BASE_EZC_DEPOSIT(R),SYS_C0011366(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST /* 예치금 발생 내역 */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT /* 예치금 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.DEPOSIT_ISSUE_SEQ = #{depositIssueSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예치금 발생 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.ISSUE_DD = #{issueDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 발생 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.ISSUE_DEPOSIT_AMT = #{issueDepositAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 발생 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.DEPOSIT_ISSUE_SEQ AS depositIssueSeq /* 예치금 발생 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.ISSUE_DD AS issueDd /* 발생 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.ISSUE_DEPOSIT_AMT AS issueDepositAmt /* 발생 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST /* 예치금 발생 내역 */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT /* 예치금 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.DEPOSIT_ISSUE_SEQ = #{depositIssueSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예치금 발생 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.ISSUE_DD = #{issueDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 발생 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.ISSUE_DEPOSIT_AMT = #{issueDepositAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 발생 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST.DEPOSIT_ISSUE_SEQ DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST SET /* 예치금 발생 내역 */ ISSUE_DD = #{issueDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 발생 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,ISSUE_DEPOSIT_AMT = #{issueDepositAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 발생 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND DEPOSIT_ISSUE_SEQ = #{depositIssueSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예치금 발생 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_DEPOSIT_ISSUE_HIST /* 예치금 발생 내역 */ WHERE 1=1 AND DEPOSIT_ISSUE_SEQ = #{depositIssueSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예치금 발생 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
